video.title: Street Food
video.synopsis: Host Ishai Golan takes us on a culinary tour around the world, sampling dishes from food stalls, markets and favorite local restaurants.

episodes.synopsis: In Istanbul, Ishai meets the famous chef and historian Vedat Basran at the Kadiköy market and tries the famous Sultans' breakfast.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Ishai spends 24 hours in Mumbai, where he visits the famous Crawford Market, learns how to make chai and tastes the city's best chicken tikka.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: In the Israeli city of Haifa, Ishai meets celebrated chef Israel Aharoni and learns how to make burekas, one of the nation's favorite snack foods.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Cuisine is an art form in Paris, where Ishai learns how to make a baguette and meets famous food critic Jill Podlovski.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: In the sweltering city of Bangkok, Ishai tries to break his own record for eating spicy dishes and visits a grasshopper food stall.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Ishai tries to find his own sense of balance while sampling pho and snake liquor in Hanoi, a city that emphasizes harmony and equilibrium.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: In Marrakech, Ishai learns about the health benefits of Morocco's many spices and gets a taste of something sweet making cookies.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Ishai samples the freedom and flavor of Amsterdam, selling stroopwafels at a local market and learning how to make a herring sandwich.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ishai samples Napoli's many delights, including delicious baked goods, authentic Italian ice cream and pasta made by a Michelin-starred chef.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Ishai visits Georgia's capital city of Tbilisi, where he learns how to make khinkali, tasty dumplings filled with meat, spices and other delights.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Ishai strolls through the holiday markets of Vienna and stops at the city's first sausage stand while visiting Austria at Christmastime.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Home to half a million street food vendors, Mexico City serves up spicy, colorful cuisine influenced by both Spanish and indigenous cultures.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: After a whirlwind tour of the world's cuisine, Ishai reflects on his culinary adventures, recalling his favorite dishes and experiences.
episodes.title: Episode 13
